original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya

original: 9.5. Hetuduka, Sanidassanattika
analyzed: hetu duka sani dassana ttika

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo
analyzed: na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na na hetu

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigha

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ ca na na hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: nana hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca nana hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca

original: nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigha

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ ca na na hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham ca na na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham ca dhammam paṭicca

original: nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca
analyzed: na hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham ca

original: nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: nana hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham ca dhammam paṭicca nana hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭighañca na na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭighañca

analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ ca na na hetu na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe avigate nava sabbattha nava

original: Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo
analyzed: na hetum na a nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu

original: naanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ ca na na hetu na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: nana hetum na a nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca nana hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na na hetum na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu

original: naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na na hetum na anidassana sappaṭigha

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ ca na na hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na hetum na a nidassana sa paṭigham ca na na hetum na a nidassana sa paṭigham ca dhammam paṭicca

original: nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca
analyzed: na hetu na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na anidassana sappaṭigham ca

original: nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: nana hetum na a nidassana sa paṭighañca dhammam paṭicca nana hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na a nidassana sa paṭighañca na na hetum na a nidassana sa paṭighañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ ca na na hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… sampayuttavārepi sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe avigate nava sahajāta vāre pi pe sampayutta vāre pi sabbattha vitthāro

original: Hetu-ārammaṇa
analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa

original: Nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nanahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa
analyzed: nana hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ nana hetussa na a nidassana sa paṭighassa dhammassa

original: hetupaccayena paccayo. Nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa
analyzed: hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na na hetu na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na a nidassana sa paṭighassa

original: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa
analyzed: dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na na hetu na a nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa

original: naanidassanasappaṭighassa ca nanahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭighassa ca na na hetussa na anidassana sappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na anidassana sappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava …pe… upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe nava pe upanissaye nava purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi āsevane

original: nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte
analyzed: nava kamme tīṇi vipāke nava āhāre tīṇi indriye nava jhāne tīṇi magge sampayutte

original: nava, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Pañhāvāraṁ evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: nava vippayutte pañca pe avigate nava pañhāvāram evam vitthāretabba

original: Nahetuṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu na anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye kamme …pe… magge ekaṁ, vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekaṁ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka adhipatiyā sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye kamme pe magge eka vippayutte atthiyā avigate eka sabbattha vitthāro
